import React from'react';import useTeamsWithProposals from'../../hooks/useTeamsWithProposals';import TeamProposalCard from'../../components/TeamProposalCard';import PageHeader from'../../components/PageHeader';import'./TeamsWithProposalPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamsWithProposalPage=()=>{const{teamsWithProposals,isLoading,navigate}=useTeamsWithProposals();const headerActions=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),className:"secondary-button",children:"\u2190 Back to Home"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageHeader,{title:"Research Teams with Proposals",subtitle:`${teamsWithProposals.length} ${teamsWithProposals.length===1?'team':'teams'} with proposals`,actions:headerActions}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content-container",children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-spinner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading teams..."})]}):teamsWithProposals.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"Research",children:"\uD83D\uDC65"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"No Teams Available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Generate teams and proposals to view them here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate(-1),className:"primary-button",children:"Go Back"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"teams-proposals-list",children:teamsWithProposals.map(team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamProposalCard,{team:team},team.team_id))})})]});};export default TeamsWithProposalPage;
